html.p: Data Collection: Use Windows Defender Add-on ([WinEventLog://Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational] stanza) for collecting Windows defender data.

search.query: `cs_windows_defender` | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_windows_defender`" | table label, data

`cs_windows_defender` EventCode=1151 $tkn_host$ | dedup host | table _time, host, RTP_state, Platform_version, Engine_version, AVSignature_version, BM_state, IOAV_state, OA_state, Last_full_scan_start_time, Last_full_scan_end_time, Last_quick_scan_start_time, Last_quick_scan_end_time | eval Last_full_scan_start_time=if(Last_full_scan_start_time="1/1/1601 12:00:00 AM", "-", Last_full_scan_start_time), Last_full_scan_end_time=if(Last_full_scan_end_time="1/1/1601 12:00:00 AM", "-", Last_full_scan_end_time), Last_quick_scan_start_time=if(Last_quick_scan_start_time="1/1/1601 12:00:00 AM", "-", Last_quick_scan_start_time), Last_quick_scan_end_time=if(Last_quick_scan_end_time="1/1/1601 12:00:00 AM", "-", Last_quick_scan_end_time) | rename AVSignature_version as "Signature Version", BM_state as "Behavior Monitoring state", IOAV_state as "IE Downloads and Outlook Express Attachments state", OA_state as "On Access state", RTP_state as "RealTime Protection State"

`cs_windows_defender` EventCode IN (2001, 2003, 2006) $tkn_host$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time, values(Error_Code) as Error_Code, values(Error_Description) as Error_Description, values(Update_Source) as Update_Source, values(Update_State) as Update_State, values(Update_Type) as Update_Type, values(Current_Engine_Version) as Current_Engine_Version, values(Previous_Engine_Version) as Previous_Engine_Version, values(Previous_Signature_Version) as Previous_Signature_Version, values(Product_Version) as Product_Version, values(Signature_Type) as Signature_Type by host, EventCode | eval EventCodeDescription=case(EventCode=2001, "The security intelligence update failed.", EventCode=2003, "The antimalware engine update failed.", EventCode=2006, "The platform update failed.") | table _time, host, EventCode, EventCodeDescription, Error_Code, Error_Description, Update_Source, Update_State, Update_Type, Current_Engine_Version, Previous_Engine_Version, Previous_Signature_Version, Product_Version, Signature_Type, count | `cs_windows_defender_update_errors_filter`

`cs_windows_defender` EventCode=5101 $tkn_host$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time, values(Error_Code) as Error_Code, values(Error_Description) as Error_Description, values(Expiration_Reason) as Expiration_Reason, values(Expiration_Date) as Expiration_Date by host | table _time, host, Error_Code, Error_Description, Expiration_Reason, Expiration_Date, count | `cs_windows_defender_antivirus_expired_filter`

panel.title: Antimalware/Antimalware Engine Dropped Support for Operating System

search.query: `cs_windows_defender` EventCode IN (2041, 2042) $tkn_host$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time by host | eval EventCodeDescription=if(EventCode=2041, "Antimalware dropped support for OS.", "Antimalware Engine dropped support for OS.") | table _time, host, EventCode, EventCodeDescription, count | `cs_windows_defender_antivirus_dropped_support_for_os_filter`
`cs_windows_defender` EventCode=5100 $tkn_host$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time by host | table _time, host, count | `cs_windows_defender_antivirus_will_expired_filter`

panel.title: Antimalware will Drop Support for Operating System Soon

search.query: `cs_windows_defender` EventCode=2040 $tkn_host$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time by host | table _time, host, count | `cs_windows_defender_antivirus_will_dropped_support_for_os_filter`
`cs_windows_defender` EventCode=1005 $tkn_host$ | table _time, host, Scan_Id, Scan_Type, Scan_Parameters, Error_Code, Error_Description | `cs_windows_defender_antivirus_scan_failed_filter`

panel.title: Unable to Download and Configure Offline Scan

search.query: `cs_windows_defender` EventCode IN (1006, 1015, 1116) $tkn_host$ | eval EventCodeDescription=case(EventCode=1006, "Antimalware engine found malware", EventCode=1015, "Antimalware platform found malware", EventCode=1116, "Antimalware platform detected suspicious behaviour") | rename Name as Threat_Name, Id as Threat_Id | table _time, host, EventCode, EventCodeDescription, Threat_Name, Threat_Id, Severity, Category, Path, Detection_Origin, Detection_Type, Detection_Source, Status, Process_Name | `cs_windows_defender_malware_detected_filter`
